title: new champion suggestion - metal robot
body:
q- rocket-


Rocket Grab	RANGE: 925 COST: 100 MANA COOLDOWN: 20 / 19 / 18 / 17 / 16
Rocket Grab	
ACTIVE: Blitzcrank extends his right hand in a line. The first enemy hit is Airborne icon pulled to his location, takes magic damage and is Stun icon stunned for 1 second.
MAGIC DAMAGE: 80 / 135 / 190 / 245 / 300 (+ 100% AP)


Overdrive	COST: 75 MANA COOLDOWN: 15
Overdrive	
ACTIVE: Blitzcrank super charges himself, gaining increased movement and attack speed for 8 seconds.
MOVEMENT SPEED: 16 / 20 / 24 / 28 / 32%
ATTACK SPEED: 30 / 38 / 46 / 54 / 62%
 [show] 
Ability Details
Power Fist	COST: 25 MANA COOLDOWN: 9 / 8 / 7 / 6 / 5
Power Fist	
ACTIVE: Blitzcrank supercharges his next basic attack, causing it to deal an additional 100% of his attack damage and Airborne icon knocking his target into the air for 1 second.
 [show] 
Ability Details
Static Field	COST: 100 MANA COOLDOWN: 30
Static Field	
PASSIVE: Every 2.5 seconds, Blitzcrank fires a lightning bolt at a random enemy within 450-range, dealing magic damage. This effect cannot target stealthed enemies.
PASSIVE MAGIC DAMAGE: 100 / 200 / 300 (+ 20% AP)
ACTIVE: Blitzcrank detonates his static field, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies within 600-range and Silence icon silencing them for 0.5 seconds. Static Field's passive damage is disabled while its active is on cooldown.
ACTIVE MAGIC DAMAGE: 250 / 375 / 500 (+ 100% AP)


lore: The Ionians have developed some of the most breathtaking and deadly martial arts on all of Runeterra
